mapper.insert: insert into order_product (product_id, order_id, add_time, state) values (#{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=SMALLINT})
